level.text: Applications for solid waste collector’s and collection vehicle licenses shall be submitted on approved forms to the Director.
The fees for solid waste collector’s and collection vehicle licenses shall be submitted with the applications to the Director.
Each application shall include the following:
The name of the person to be licensed;
If the applicant is other than an individual, the name and title of the applicant; and
The address and telephone number of the location to which the license will apply.
Each application shall also contain the following information concerning each vehicle to be licensed:
Type, make, and year of manufacture;

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Regulation No. 71-21, approved June 29, 1971, 18 DCR 16 (July 12, 1971); 8 DCRR §§8-31606(b) and (e).
